comment.author: 38828133@N03
comment._content:
That is really nice.  I love how the church is in the back and the waterfall is in the front.  Viewing these pictures makes we want to go and see these buildings in person.  I even told my friends to go on look at these pictures and they agree they are amazing. 

Please keep it up. 
Cheryl
